group_1.textLeft: Madoka. Mami isn't back from Kamihama...

group_1.textRight: Yeah... Maybe something happened to her...
I haven't seen her at school, either…

group_1.textLeft: No way anything could happen to her...[chara:200301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:200301:cheek_0][chara:200301:motion_200][chara:200301:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:200301:lipSynch_1]@I'm sure she's safe!

group_1.textRight: Yeah...you're right.
Mami can handle herself. It should be a piece@of cake for her!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, she may have returned home by now.

group_1.textRight: Home...
Hey, Homura! Wanna go check out her place?!
Maybe she really is already there!

group_1.textLeft: You're right. We should go have a look.

group_1.narration: But, when we went to her house,@it was...completely empty.

group_1.textRight: Mami...

group_1.textLeft: (Looks like she hasn't been here for a while.@So something must've happened...)

group_1.textRight: She didn't come to school... She's not at@home either...
Something's definitely wrong here. What@could've happened to her?

group_1.textLeft: (The only way to know what happened to@Mami is to follow her...)

group_1.textRight: Homura, I think I'll try going to Kamihama.
If Mami got into some kind of trouble...
We have to go help her!

group_1.textLeft: (No. I can't let Madoka go there!)
(I can't let her go somewhere that even@Mami couldn't come back from!)

group_1.textRight: But you said you really wanted to go...
Besides, if Mami is there, we need to go help@her!

group_1.textLeft: If Kamihama is so dangerous that even she@can't make it out...
There won't be anything that we can do@to help her.

group_1.textRight: W-well...

group_1.textLeft: If you got trapped there too...

group_1.textRight: Homura...
You've got a point.
If we go, the same thing could happen to@us...

group_1.textLeft: We have no way to know what's there, so we@may as well head home and rest for today.

group_1.textRight: Okay... You're right...

group_1.textLeft: Let's wait for her one more day. There's@still a chance she could come back.

group_1.narration: I told you not to go…
But I have to investigate Kamihama.
Mami's missing, so it's up to me@to uncover what secrets it holds.
I'm going to find the root of all these@phenomena and discover the truth!

group_1.textCenter: I'm going to Kamihama, Madoka...@To change your fate.
